template.name: SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP
template.description: Zabbix template for Siemens Scalance X200 MSPS devices, extended with detailed SNMP items and discovery rules for monitoring various aspects like Ethernet ports, SFP diagnostics, power supply, system faults, and mobile interfaces, based on Netgear template structure. Updated for full port monitoring.

trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Unavailable by ICMP ping
trigger.description: Ostatnie trzy próby zwróciły timeout. Sprawdź łączność urządzenia.

trigger.expression: min(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)<100
trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: High ICMP ping loss

dependency.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Unavailable by ICMP ping

trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: High ICMP ping response time

dependency.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: High ICMP ping loss
dependency.expression: min(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)>{$ICMP_LOSS_WARN} and min(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/icmppingloss,5m)<100

dependency.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Unavailable by ICMP ping

item.name: System Fault State
item.description: Ogólny stan awarii systemu. (1: noFault, 2: fault)

trigger.name: Device {HOST.NAME} is in fault state
trigger.description: Urządzenie znajduje się w stanie awarii.

item.name: Login Authentication Method
item.description: Metoda uwierzytelniania logowania.

item.name: Mobile Interface 395 Connection Status
item.description: Status połączenia interfejsu mobilnego 395. (1: Idle, 2: HomeNetwork, 3: Searching, etc.)

trigger.name: Mobile Interface 395 on {HOST.NAME} is not connected
trigger.description: Interfejs mobilny nie jest połączony z siecią domową.

item.name: PIN Status (Mobile Interface 395)
item.description: Status PINu dla interfejsu mobilnego 395. (1: validPIN, 2: wrongPIN, 3: requirePIN, etc.)

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/snmp.get[snMspsMobileInterfacePinStatus.395])=2 or last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/snmp.get[snMspsMobileInterfacePinStatus.395])=3
trigger.name: PIN on {HOST.NAME} is wrong or required

item.name: Mobile Interface 395 Signal Strength (dBm)
item.description: Siła sygnału interfejsu mobilnego w dBm.

trigger.name: Mobile Interface 395 Signal Strength low ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger.description: Siła sygnału interfejsu mobilnego jest niska.

item.name: SIM Card Status (Mobile Interface 395)
item.description: Status karty SIM dla interfejsu mobilnego 395. (1: present, 2: missing, 3: defective, 5: pending)

item.name: SINEMA RC Connection Status
item.description: Status połączenia z serwerem SINEMA RC. (1: established, 2: pending, 3: error, 4: disabled, 5: unknown)

trigger.name: SINEMA RC connection on {HOST.NAME} is not established
trigger.description: Połączenie z SINEMA RC nie jest nawiązane.

item.name: Device Group
item.description: Grupa urządzeń Scalance X200 MSPS.

item.name: Device Type
item.description: Typ urządzenia Scalance X200 MSPS.

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/snmp.get[snMspsSystemDeviceType.0])<>last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/snmp.get[snMspsSystemDeviceType.0])
trigger.name: Device Type changed on {HOST.NAME}
trigger.description: Typ urządzenia został zmieniony. Potwierdź, aby ręcznie zamknąć problem.

item.name: SNMP traps (fallback)
item.description: The item is used to collect all SNMP traps unmatched by other snmptrap items

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: System contact details
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The textual identification of the contact person for this managed node, together with information on how to contact this person. If no contact information is known, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: CPU utilization
item.description: MIB: SN-MSPS-SCX200-MIB The CPU utilization expressed in %.

trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: High CPU utilization
trigger.event_name: Scalance X200 MSPS: High CPU utilization (over {$CPU.UTIL.CRIT}% for 5m)
trigger.description: The CPU utilization is too high. The system might be slow to respond.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: System description
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB A textual description of the entity. This value should include the full name and version identification of the system's hardware type, software operating-system, and networking software.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Hardware model name
item.description: MIB: SN-MSPS-SCX200-MIB

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Hardware serial number
item.description: MIB: SN-MSPS-SCX200-MIB Serial number of the switch

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber,#1)<>last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber,#2) and length(last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.hw.serialnumber))>0
trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Device has been replaced
trigger.description: Device serial number has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Uptime (hardware)
item.description: MIB: HOST-RESOURCES-MIB The amount of time since this host was last initialized. Note that this is different from sysUpTime in the SNMPv2-MIB [RFC1907] because sysUpTime is the uptime of the network management portion of the system.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: System location
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The physical location of this node (e.g., `telephone closet, 3rd floor'). If the location is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: System name
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB An administratively-assigned name for this managed node.By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name. If the name is unknown, the value is the zero-length string.

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.name,#1)<>last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.name,#2) and length(last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.name))>0
trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: System name has changed
trigger.event_name: Scalance X200 MSPS: System name has changed (new name: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: The name of the system has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Uptime (network)
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The time (in hundredths of a second) since the network management portion of the system was last re-initialized.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: System object ID
item.description: MIB: SNMPv2-MIB The vendor's authoritative identification of the network management subsystem contained in the entity. This value is allocated within the SMI enterprises subtree (1.3.6.1.4.1) and provides an easy and unambiguous means for determining`what kind of box' is being managed. For example, if vendor`Flintstones, Inc.' was assigned the subtree1.3.6.1.4.1.4242, it could assign the identifier 1.3.6.1.4.1.4242.1.1 to its `Fred Router'.

item.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Operating system
item.description: MIB: SN-MSPS-SCX200-MIB Operating System running on this unit

trigger.expression: last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.sw.os[snMspsSystemSwVersion.0],#1)<>last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.sw.os[snMspsSystemSwVersion.0],#2) and length(last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.sw.os[snMspsSystemSwVersion.0]))>0
trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Operating system has changed
trigger.event_name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Operating system has changed (new OS: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Operating system has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: SNMP agent availability
item.description: Dostępność kontroli SNMP na hoście.

trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: No SNMP data collection
trigger.description: SNMP jest niedostępne do odpytywania. Sprawdź łączność urządzenia i ustawienia SNMP.

dependency.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Unavailable by ICMP ping

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX}: Speed
item_prototype.description: Prędkość wentylatora w obrotach na minutę (RPM).

item_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX}: State
item_prototype.description: Stan wentylatora. (1: operational, 2: failed, 3: powering, 4: notpowering, 5: notpresent)

trigger_prototype.name: Fan {#SNMPINDEX} on {HOST.NAME} is in critical state
Nazwa: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Duplex status UNKNOWN
trigger_prototype.description: Gdy tryb duplex jest nieznany, trigger jest uruchamiany.

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High inbound discarded packet rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik odrzuconych pakietów wejściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High inbound error rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik błędów wejściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High outbound discarded packet rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik odrzuconych pakietów wyjściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High outbound error rate
trigger_prototype.description: Wysoki wskaźnik błędów wyjściowych na interfejsie {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}).

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Port is locked
trigger_prototype.description: Port {#IFNAME} ({#IFALIAS}) jest zablokowany (MAC Learning i Forwarding wyłączone).

discovery_rule.name: SFP Diagnostics Discovery
discovery_rule.description: Odkrywanie diagnostyki SFP na podstawie snMspsDiagnosticsTemperatureEntry.

trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Temperature is above critical threshold ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: Temperatura modułu SFP jest powyżej krytycznego progu.

trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Temperature is above warning threshold ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: Temperatura modułu SFP jest powyżej progu ostrzegawczego.

dependency.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Temperature is above critical threshold ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})

trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SNMPINDEX}: Voltage is too low ({ITEM.LASTVALUE})
trigger_prototype.description: Napięcie modułu SFP jest zbyt niskie.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/sfp.current[snMspsSfpCurrent.{#SNMPINDEX}])<{$SFP.CURRENT.MIN} or last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/sfp.current[snMspsSfpCurrent.{#SNMPINDEX}])>{$SFP.CURRENT.MAX}
trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}): Current out of range
SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}): Module missing or faulty
trigger_prototype.description: Moduł SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}) jest brakujący lub uszkodzony.

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/sfp.voltage[snMspsSfpVoltage.{#SNMPINDEX}])<{$SFP.VOLTAGE.MIN} or last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/sfp.voltage[snMspsSfpVoltage.{#SNMPINDEX}])>{$SFP.VOLTAGE.MAX}
trigger_prototype.name: SFP {#SFPNAME} ({#SFPSERIAL}): Voltage out of range

trigger.expression: (last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0])>0 and last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0])<10m) or (last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.hw.uptime[hrSystemUptime.0])=0 and last(/SCALANCE XC206-2SFP by SNMP/system.net.uptime[sysUpTime.0])<10m)
trigger.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: Host has been restarted
trigger.event_name: Scalance X200 MSPS: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted (uptime < 10m)
trigger.description: Czas działania jest krótszy niż 10 minut.

dependency.name: Scalance X200 MSPS: No SNMP data collection
